title.zh-CN: 被低估的高转化推广平台

description.en: Forget Product Hunt. These lesser-known launch platforms drove more real users.
description.zh-CN: 别只盯着 Product Hunt。这些小众平台反而带来了更多真实用户。

description.en: Platform to pitch and share your startup story
description.zh-CN: 展示和分享创业故事的平台

description.en: Share your business journey and growth story
description.zh-CN: 分享创业历程和增长故事

description.en: Compare and discover open source alternatives
description.zh-CN: 对比和发现开源项目的目录

description.en: Connect with investors and get your startup assessed
description.zh-CN: 连接投资人、获取创业项目评估

description.en: Classic community forum with engaged discussions
description.zh-CN: 经典社区问答，讨论氛围活跃

description.en: Developer community for sharing and discovering ideas
description.zh-CN: 开发者分享和交流的社区

description.en: Publish your tool as a Chrome extension
description.zh-CN: 把产品做成 Chrome 扩展发布

description.en: Create integrations to reach Zapier's user base
description.zh-CN: 创建集成触达 Zapier 用户群

description.en: Build a Slack app to reach teams and workplaces
description.zh-CN: 构建 Slack 应用触达团队用户

description.en: Alternative to Zapier for workflow automation
description.zh-CN: Zapier 的替代品，工作流自动化平台

description.en: Where top designers find their next homepage idea. Real sites, real inspiration.
description.zh-CN: 顶尖设计师的灵感来源。真实上线的网站，真实可用的灵感。

description.en: Real-world mobile and web UI patterns from top apps
description.zh-CN: 来自顶级应用的真实 UI 设计模式

description.en: Curated bento-style layout inspiration
description.zh-CN: Bento 风格布局灵感合集

description.en: Showcase of the finest web and interactive design
description.zh-CN: 精选网页与交互设计展示

description.en: One-page website design gallery and templates
description.zh-CN: 单页网站设计案例和模板

description.en: The only footer design inspiration you need
description.zh-CN: 页脚设计灵感大全

description.en: Hand-picked collection of outstanding websites
description.zh-CN: 精心挑选的优秀网站合集

description.en: Hero section design inspiration for landing pages
description.zh-CN: 落地页首屏设计灵感

description.en: Astronomically good web design inspiration
description.zh-CN: 极致精美的网页设计灵感

description.en: Landing page designs, templates, and components
description.zh-CN: 落地页设计、模板和组件

description.en: Design gallery featuring beautiful landing pages
description.zh-CN: 精美落地页设计画廊

description.en: Curated collection of delightful websites
description.zh-CN: 令人愉悦的网站精选合集

description.en: Award-winning website designs judged by experts
description.zh-CN: 专家评选的获奖网站设计

title.zh-CN: 周末值得打开的 8 个网站

description.en: From internet history to ambient noise to AI builders — 8 sites that actually pulled me in this week. Most need no signup.
description.zh-CN: 互联网博物馆、白噪音生成器、AI 建站工具——8 个我这周打开后真的多看了几眼的网站。

description.en: Scroll through 57 internet milestones, from the first email to early YouTube. It's interactive history that doesn't feel like homework.
description.zh-CN: 互联网历史互动时间线，从第一封邮件到早期 YouTube 一共 57 个节点。不是枯燥的编年史，每个点进去都有意思。

description.en: Mix 84 ambient sounds however you want. Rain + distant train + soft static. I use it when I need to focus or just sit still for a minute.
description.zh-CN: 84 种环境音随便叠加。窗外雨声 + 远处火车 + 轻微白噪音。我用它来专注，或者单纯发个呆。

description.en: Sorts 130k+ subreddits by pain points, feature requests, and money talk. If you're building something, this is where you find what people actually want.
description.zh-CN: 把 Reddit 13 万个子版块按痛点、需求、花钱讨论自动分类。做产品的人进去基本出不来。

description.en: The most visually striking websites on the internet, updated daily. Pure inspiration if you're tired of template designs.
description.zh-CN: 互联网上视觉最炸的网页设计合集，每天更新。看腻了模板网站的话，这里全是灵感。

description.en: Unlike Godly's "wow" factor, this one collects sites that just feel good to use. Subtle animations, clean layouts, warmth over flashiness.
description.zh-CN: 跟 Godly 的「炸眼」不同，这里收集的是「用起来舒服」的网站。细节动画、克制排版、温度感大于炫技。

description.en: Describe an app in plain English, get a working full-stack project in minutes. Best way to start something on a Saturday morning.
description.zh-CN: 用自然语言描述一个应用，几分钟给你一个能跑的全栈项目。周六早上想做点什么的时候，从这开始最快。

description.en: Build, run, and deploy a web app entirely in your browser. No terminal, no local setup. Just type what you want and watch it build.
description.zh-CN: 在浏览器里直接构建、运行、部署 Web 应用。不用终端，不用本地环境，说清楚你要什么，看着它给你搭出来。

description.en: Goals, habits, and tasks in one clean space. A good weekend is also when you figure out what actually matters in your week.
description.zh-CN: 目标、习惯、任务放在一个干净的界面里。好的周末，也是想清楚「这周什么最重要」的时候。
